metadata.title: First-in-human clinical trials with vaccines-what regulators want

abstract.original_text: Several factors should be taken into account when it comes to the first exposure of humans to a novel vaccine.

sentences.segment_text: Several factors should be taken into account when it comes to the first exposure of humans to a novel vaccine .

abstract.original_text: In the so-called Cutter incident in 1955, Cutter Laboratories of Berkeley, California, failed to fully inactivate a batch of polio vaccine (vials shown). This is one of the rare examples where documented adverse events were associated with the use of a vaccine in humans.

sentences.segment_text: In the so-called Cutter incident in 1955 ,
failed to fully inactivate a batch of polio vaccine ( vials shown ) .
This is one of the rare examples where documented adverse events were associated with the use of a vaccine in humans .
